message: I just learned about Convore from seeing the interview on This Week in Startups.  Anyway I have been browsing through this group and I saw a couple of posts about a command-line tool and an Objective C library but I was wondering if there was some list of projects in development?

Specifically I'm thinking that a Wordpress plugin that creates a new topic in a group that corresponds to a blog would be a nice idea.  Really I would think an embedded Convore would likely compete very favorably with Disqus.
@mridley no wiki listing projects or anything yet
a wordpress plugin would be fantastic... I've heard from a few people who might be interested in having a plugin but I don't think anyone has said they're making one

Ah well perhaps that's something I should look into in my non-existent free time :-)  I think I'm going to update the theme for my wordpress site that I never update and then after that maybe I'll look at making a convore plugin.  I really like the idea of interactivity.  Not so much for my web site that nobody ever reads, but when I go somewhere like the New York Times I *know* that there are probably hundreds or thousands of people also "there" but I can't see them or interact with them.  I think that's silly in 2011.
